tool_description: Use a pretrained saprot backbone model and a finetuned adaptor model to do inference. This is usually used after a saprot tuning task is finished.

required_parameters.name: protein_sequence
required_parameters.description: A string representing the amino acid sequence of the protein.

required_parameters.name: task_type
required_parameters.description: The task type of this saprot model.

required_parameters.name: model_dir
required_parameters.description: The directory of the finetuned saprot model

return_values.name: output
return_values.description: The output of the finetuned saprot model
